content: the winter is still cold but spring is around the corner and a poncho or cape is perfect for the flowery season in fact you can choose to wear it as a poncho if you keep the points in the front and the back or a cape if you keep them along the arms so it is like two garments in one thank you to manuela vallini di alessandria now this pattern is also available in italian thank you very much to catherine cordonnier ktyfamily 1 for the french translation thank you very much to milimani 2 for the german translation 1 http //www ravelry com/people/ktyfamily 2 http //www ravelry com/people/milimani
